TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GridPattern/GridPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Fornece acesso aos valores de propriedade de um objeto usando os próprios acessadores ou .

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

Padrões de Controle para Clientes de Automação de IU

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnCount As Integer
public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtém o número de colunas em uma grade.

span.span: Gets the number of columns in a grid.

value.span: O número total de colunas em uma grade.

span.span: The total number of columns in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Linhas e colunas, dependendo da implementação do provedor, ocultas podem ser carregadas na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] de árvore e, portanto, serão refletidas na e propriedades.Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. Se as linhas e colunas ocultas têm ainda não foram carregadas não são contados.If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they are not counted. O valor padrão é 0.The default value is 0. ## Examples No exemplo a seguir, um ouvinte de eventos é configurar uma alteração de estrutura de grade, como uma linha ou coluna de grade item que está sendo adicionado ou removido da grade.In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowCount As Integer
public: property int RowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtém o número total de linhas em uma grade.

span.span: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.

value.span: O número total de linhas em uma grade.

span.span: The total number of rows in a grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Linhas e colunas, dependendo da implementação do provedor, ocultas podem ser carregadas na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] de árvore e, portanto, serão refletidas na e propriedades.Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the and properties. Se as linhas e colunas ocultas têm ainda não foram carregadas que eles não serão contados.If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they will not be counted. O valor padrão é 0.The default value is 0. ## Examples No exemplo a seguir, um ouvinte de eventos é configurar uma alteração de estrutura de grade, como uma linha ou coluna de grade item que está sendo adicionado ou removido da grade.In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]
